data.eml:eml: The collection of Nematomorpha in the Zoological Museum Hamburg, including description of a new species, Chordodesjelkae sp. n.

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schmidt-Rhaesa, Andreas (2016): The collection of Nematomorpha in the Zoological Museum Hamburg, including description of a new species, Chordodesjelkae sp. n. Zoosystematics and Evolution 92 (2): 211-250, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zse.92.10351, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zse.92.10351
